name: FiveM Forums - Dark Alternative
description: This is an alternative dark theme for FiveM.

user.name: Jonathan88
user.about: My name is Jonathan and i'm a web developer :)

additional_info:
This is an alternative dark theme on FiveM forums. 

NOTE: YOU MUST FOLLOW THESE INSTRUCTIONS OR IT WILL NOT WORK -
 - Go to your account preferences by clicking your thumbnail on the top right and the gear icon. 
 - Click on interface on the left side. 
 - Select dark theme.
 - Enable this theme

If you have any suggestions/comments/gripes feel free to let me know. I'll note all constructive criticism.
